main.name: Shubhi Kulshreshtha
main.description: I eat, sleep and breathe React
main.bio: I am an experienced React Developer with over 3 years of expertise in building dynamic and responsive web applications. Proficient in React, Redux, and JavaScript, I have a proven track record of optimizing code and collaborating effectively within Agile teams. Currently, I am working as an Associate Software Developer at Cognizant, where I have contributed to significant projects for major clients, focusing on performance optimization, code refactoring, and enhancing user experience. I hold a Bachelor of Technology in Computer Science from GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management and am skilled in various technologies including REST API, Git, NPM, SQL, MongoDB, HTML, CSS, NodeJS, JavaScript, Jest, Java, Typescript, NextJs, DOM, and Webpack. I am a team player with strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail, ensuring high-quality code through rigorous testing and review processes.
main.contactmessage: Hey, drop an email below. Let's Get in touch!!

education.description: Graduated with a B.Tech in CSE with a CGPA of 7.95/10
